page.title: 06A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: Each friday I wake up at 8 a.m. and get ready for school.I put on a cotton shirt,a vest,underpants,socks,some shorts and a jumper.I go downstairs and have my breakfast.My breakfast consists of two Weetabix with milk.After that i have an egg or a bacon sandwich. I set off for school at five to nine.I get there just in time. At school we have an assembly.This lasts for about twenty minutes.After that we have bank while we are having English.We usually read a story and then have to answer questions.The answers are hidden in the story.Each Friday it is our turn to use the computer.After playtime we do maths for an hour until 12 p.m. We have a playtime while the younger children are eating lunch. ctd.P.7
